name: @nebula.gl/editor
description: A suite of 3D-enabled data editing layers, suitable for deck.gl
author: Georgios Karnas <georgios@uber.com>

scripts.build-clean: rm -fr dist dist-es6 && mkdir -p dist dist-es6
scripts.build-es6: rm -fr dist-es6 && BABEL_ENV=es6 babel src --config-file ../../babel.config.js --out-dir dist-es6 --source-maps inline
scripts.build-es5: rm -fr dist && BABEL_ENV=es5 babel src --config-file ../../babel.config.js --out-dir dist --source-maps inline
scripts.build: yarn build-clean && yarn build-es6 && yarn build-es5 && cp ../../README.md .
scripts.publish-prod: yarn build && yarn test && yarn test-dist && npm publish
scripts.publish-beta: yarn build && yarn test && yarn test-dist && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.test: yarn lint && yarn build && yarn flow && yarn jest
scripts.test-r: yarn lint && yarn build && yarn test-node && (cd test/rendering-test && node node-rendering.js)
scripts.test-cover: NODE_ENV=test tape -r babel-register test/node.js && nyc report
